entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:42 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:42 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:42 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
